Title: Interview with Eric Evans, Udi Dahan and Diego Vega discussing CQRS and DDD
Content: Udi Dahan has [just blogged](http://www.udidahan.com/2011/11/30/recording-of-joint-interview-with-eric-evans/) about a discussion between him and Eric Evans covering the topics of DDD and CQRS. The talk was recorded and a [video](http://vimeo.com/32647895) has been made available to watch courtesy of .dotNetMania (DNM).
